name: Hefty Brute
text: You might be a different subspecies or simply a well-fed and well-grown beast, but either way you’re built on a more massive scale than the rest of your kind.
benefit: You treat your size as one category larger for the purposes of calculating CMB, CMD, carrying capacity, and any size-based special attacks you use or that are used against you (such as grab, swallow whole, and trample).
text_zh: 你可能属于一个不同寻常的亚种或者仅仅是一只食物充分并生长良好的野兽，不论如何你的体型相比你的同类更加巨大。
benefit_zh: 在判断CMB、CMD、负重能力，以及任意你使用的或用来对付你的基于体型的特殊攻击（例如攫抓、活吞和践踏）时，你将自身的体型视作更大的一个级别。
